price: Wͻn mu dodoͻ no ara na wͻnnye Nyankopͻn nnie, na mmom wͻyε (Nyame ho) mmatahoo.
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
